results.title: Evaluation of the Antinociceptive Action of Simvastatin in Mice
results.text_hl: Similarly, it inhibits @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@inflammatory pain@@@ more predominantly than @DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neurogenic @DISEASE_MESH:D001750 @@@neurogenic@@@, and hence @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can be used in @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ conditions like @DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@rheumatoid arthritis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@ particularly when there is coexisting @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.

results.title: Therapeutic effects of statins on osteoarthritis: A review.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@Atorvastatin@@@ stimulates the @GENE_STAT1 @GENE_6772 @@@STAT1@@@-@GENE_CASP3 @GENE_836 @@@caspase-3@@@ signaling pathway that was shown to be responsible for its anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects on the knee joint. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ had chondroprotective effects on @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ in vitro by reducing matrix metalloproteinases expression patterns.

results.title: Ultrasound-targeted simvastatin-loaded microbubble destruction promotes OA cartilage repair by modulating the cholesterol efflux pathway mediated by PPARgamma in rabbits
results.text_hl: ...In vitro, @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ chondrocytes were treated with ultrasound (US), US-targeted microbubble destruction (UTMD), @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SV@@@), and UTMDSV on alternate days for four weeks.

results.title: Identification and analysis of immune aging related biomarkers in cartilage and meniscus tissues of osteoarthritis.
results.text_hl: It suggested that mecasermin and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may exhibit significant clinical potential in treating immunosenescence-related @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@.

results.title: Potential benefits of statin therapy in reducing osteoarthritis risk: a Mendelian randomization study.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: The purpose of this study was to determine the causal effect of statins on @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@) risk using Mendelian randomization (MR).

results.text_hl: Higher statin doses had higher @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ risk (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ equivalent daily of >40 mg).

results.title: Mechanically induced experimental knee osteoarthritis benefits from anti-inflammatory and immunomodulatory properties of simvastatin via inhibition of matrix metalloproteinase-3
results.text_hl: Suppression of this matrix-degrading enzyme by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ also reduced OARSI scores, suggesting the potential for statins against @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@OA@@@ progression.
